info.title: DapperMatic REST API
info.description: Database schema management REST API using DapperMatic

get.summary: Gets all registered datasources

post.summary: Adds a new datasource

get.summary: Gets a datasource by ID

delete.summary: Removes a datasource

get.summary: Tests datasource connectivity
Gets all available data types for a specific datasource
get.description: Returns a list of data types available in the specified datasource, including provider-specific types, extensions, and custom types. Use include=customTypes to discover user-defined types from the database.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Optional parameter to include additional data. Use 'customTypes' to discover user-defined types from the database (PostgreSQL domains, enums, composite types).

get.summary: Gets all schemas for a datasource

post.summary: Creates a new schema

get.summary: Gets a schema by name

delete.summary: Drops a schema

get.summary: Checks if a schema exists
Gets all tables for the default schema

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in the response. Use 'columns' to include column definitions, 'indexes' for indexes, 'constraints' for constraints, or '*' to include all fields. By default, only basic table information is returned.

post.summary: Creates a new table in the default schema

get.summary: Gets a table by name from the default schema

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in the response. Use 'columns' to include column definitions, 'indexes' for indexes, 'constraints' for constraints, or '*' to include all fields.

put.summary: Updates a table in the default schema

delete.summary: Drops a table from the default schema

get.summary: Checks if a table exists in the default schema
Queries a table in the default schema using URL parameters

post.summary: Queries a table in the default schema with filtering, sorting, and pagination

get.summary: Gets all tables for a specific schema

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in the response. Use 'columns' to include column definitions, 'indexes' for indexes, 'constraints' for constraints, or '*' to include all fields. By default, only basic table information is returned.

get.summary: Gets a table by name from a specific schema

get.summary: Gets all views for the default schema

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in the response. Use 'definition' to include view definitions, or '*' to include all fields. By default, definitions are excluded.

post.summary: Creates a new view in the default schema

get.summary: Gets a view by name from the default schema

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in the response. Use 'definition' to include the view definition, or '*' to include all fields. By default, the definition is excluded.

put.summary: Updates an existing view in the default schema

delete.summary: Drops a view from the default schema

get.summary: Checks if a view exists in the default schema
Queries a view in the default schema using URL parameters

post.summary: Queries a view in the default schema with filtering, sorting, and pagination
